title: Build Afnan Tahib Personal Portfolio Website

requirements.text: Rebuild the entire frontend as a personal portfolio for Afnan Tahib. Replace all existing department-focused sections with a fully responsive single-page portfolio using a dark theme with blue/purple AI-inspired gradients, subtle glassmorphism UI, hover effects, micro-interactions, and smooth scroll animations. Apply consistent dark background colors, glassy card surfaces, and blue-to-purple gradient accents throughout every section and component. Use a modern sans-serif heading font paired with a clean body font. All existing department sections (Programs, Faculty, Labs, Placements, Research, Events, Achievements as department-centric) must be replaced with the personal portfolio sections described in subsequent requirements.

quotes: Dark theme with blue/purple AI-inspired gradients

acceptanceCriteria: Site renders on a dark background throughout all sections
Blue/purple gradient accents are visible on headings, buttons, and card borders
Glassmorphism effect (backdrop blur, semi-transparent surfaces) is applied to cards and nav
All interactive cards and buttons have hover transitions/micro-interactions
Layout is fully responsive on mobile (< 768px), tablet (768–1024px), and desktop (> 1024px)
Smooth scroll behavior is active for all anchor/CTA navigation

requirements.text: Implement a full-screen Hero section with: large bold name 'Afnan Tahib', subtitle 'AI & Data Science Undergraduate', intro text 'Passionate about Machine Learning, Data Analytics, and building intelligent solutions that solve real-world problems.', two CTA buttons ('View Projects' smooth-scrolls to the Projects section, 'Contact Me' smooth-scrolls to the Contact section), and a live animated neural network or abstract AI grid canvas effect as the background.

quotes: Large bold name display: Afnan Tahib
Passionate about Machine Learning, Data Analytics, and building intelligent solutions that solve real-world problems.
CTA Buttons: View Projects, Contact Me
Background with animated neural network or abstract AI grid effect

Each skill entry should display its name and a visual indicator (animated progress bar or badge card). Apply staggered scroll-in animations.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ (useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts) or frontend/src/main.tsx
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui/
All generated images must be served as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo
nonGoals: Do not retain any department-specific sections (Faculty, Programs, Labs, Placements, Events, Research as department features)
Do not implement Internet Identity authentication for the portfolio
Do not implement a CMS or admin panel for managing portfolio content
Do not integrate external APIs beyond the ICP backend actor
